程序包 cn.qfys521.config

类 Config<T>

java.lang.Object
cn.qfys521.config.Config<T>
类型参数:
T - The type of data this configuration holds.
直接已知子类:
JsonConfig, PropertiesConfig, XmlConfig, YamlConfig
public abstract class Config<T> extends Object
An abstract base class representing a configuration for data storage and retrieval. Subclasses of this class provide concrete implementations for saving and loading data to/from specific file formats (e.g., JSON, XML, YAML).

    abstract T
    loadOrFail()
    Loads data from a file in a format specific to the implementing subclass and casts it to the type `T`.
    abstract void
    saveOrFail()
    Saves the data object to a file in a format specific to the implementing subclass.

  • 方法详细资料

    • saveOrFail

      public abstract void saveOrFail()
      Saves the data object to a file in a format specific to the implementing subclass. Throws an IOException if any errors occur during file operations.

    • loadOrFail

      public abstract T loadOrFail()
      Loads data from a file in a format specific to the implementing subclass and casts it to the type `T`. Throws an IOException if any errors occur during file operations.
      返回:
      The data object loaded from the configuration file, cast to the type `T`.
